bill.title: Medicaid Coverage of Rapid Whole Genome Sequencing
bill.description: Requires AHCA, subject to federal approval, to include coverage of rapid whole genome sequencing as separately payable service for certain Medicaid recipients; requires that genetic data generated as result of rapid whole genome sequencing be used only for specified purposes; provides for use of such data in scientific research if patient or his or her legal guardian provides express consent for that use; provides for rescission of such consent; requires entities conducting scientific research, upon receipt of written revocation of consent, to cease use of patient's data & expunge it from any data repositories where it is held; requires agency to seek federal approval to amend current waivers, request new waiver, & amend contracts as necessary for specified purpose; requires agency to adopt rules.
